The Chicago Cubs are adding Edward Cabrera to their rotation, agreeing Wednesday to acquire the right-hander in a trade with the Miami Marlins in their first major offseason move.
Chicago agreed to send outfielder Owen Caissie and infield prospects Cristian Hernandez and Edgardo De Leon to Miami.
Edward Cabrera turned in the best season of his career in 2025, when he posted a 3.53 ERA and a walk rate of just 8.3%.
